title: Amara Raja sign MoU with Piaggio India to develop lithium-ion cells for electric vehicles
description: Amara Raja has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Italian motor vehicle manufacturer Piaggio India to develop and supply LFP (Lithium Iron Phosphate) Lithium-Ion (Li-ion) cells and chargers for its electric vehicles, the company said in its stock market filing on Saturday.
